name: Technetium
educationalNotes: Technetium is the first element without stable isotopes - ALL its atoms are radioactive! Yet technetium-99m is most important medical imaging isotope worldwide - detects cancer, bone disease, heart problems. Technetium-43 decays to rhenium. Discovered in 1937 by bombardment (first artificially created element). Most technetium is 'waste' from nuclear reactors - extracted and used in hospitals. Technetium never naturally occurs on Earth in significant amounts.
